verses.roman:
ei-mata advaita-gṛhe bhakta-gaṇa mile
vañcilā kataka-dina mahā-kutūhale

synonyms: ei-mate—in this way; advaita-gṛhe—at the home of Advaita Ācārya; bhakta-gaṇa—all the devotees; mile—meet together; vañcilā—passed; kataka-dina—some days; mahā-kutūhale—in a greatly festive mood.
translation: In this way, at Advaita Ācārya's house all the devotees met and passed some days together in a greatly festive mood.
